title: it's offical, urgot counters zed?
body:
i go on to spectate, i see a zed, against an urgot, the urgot has flash and cleanse 
and he proceeds to beat the ever living shit out of zed

meanwhile, Dark horses, urgot top.

replies.body: it was in LCS, cannot be more official.

Basically, Urgot is a counter to Zed because:

1. his passive negates Zed's burst (and last hitting power even)
2. he is an anti melee lane bully
3. he is AD (if zed wants a defensive item, he can't just buy a mercurial scimitar and do damage anyway)
4. his ult counters Zed's
5. his build path inherently counters AD champions
6. he becomes a powerful team fighter with underrated 1v1 ability

Yeah, and that probably isn't all of what makes him good vs Zed, just what I can think off the top of my head.
doesn't Urgot have a lock-in with his Q if he lands his E, neutralizing Zed's mobility factor?
Yes, though the main problem is landing the damn E in the first place.

True...

I think the main thing to do is ult before Zed ults, and when Zed uses his shadow aim his E where Zed is going to juke (he should be taking minion aggro, I believe).
that's part of what makes him good against melees, but yes, that could be a point on its own.

> [{quoted}](name=junglerboy16,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Aj7yAAvM,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-03-27T17:52:31.044+0000)
>
> Basically, Urgot is a counter to Zed because:
> 
> 1. his passive negates Zed's burst (and last hitting power even)
> 2. he is an anti melee lane bully
> 3. he is AD (if zed wants a defensive item, he can't just buy a mercurial scimitar and do damage anyway)
> 4. his ult counters Zed's
> 5. his build path inherently counters AD champions
> 6. he becomes a powerful team fighter with underrated 1v1 ability
> 
> Yeah, and that probably isn't all of what makes him good vs Zed, just what I can think off the top of my head.

6 is a crock of shit except for the last half of it.  Sorry, but bottom-of-the-barrel attack range + E reliant Q + a suicidal ultimate does not a strong teamfighter make.

> [{quoted}](name=Rijda,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Aj7yAAvM,comment-id=00040001,timestamp=2015-03-28T02:09:15.926+0000)
>
> 6 is a crock of shit except for the last half of it.  Sorry, but bottom-of-the-barrel attack range + E reliant Q + a suicidal ultimate does not a strong teamfighter make.

Aoe armor shred DoT
And tanky as heck for a carry with the damage he has.

He doesn't need to auto lock Q when he is up in the enemy team's face, which he can do quite easily because even in a damage build he is extremely tanky. I think you're thinking of ADC Urgot, which is crap, but top or mid lane Urgot are very durable (especially since the new mana scaling on W gives about 140+ extra net shield strength with only {{item:3110}} and {{item:3042}}) That and his passive can make him deceptively hard to kill if he tags the enemy carry/assassin with it

{{champion:238}} "Balance is Weakness"
{{champion:6}} "Oh you sweet summer child..."

Everyone with a suppress counters Zed 1v1.

Zed likes to duel Malzahars 1v1 and still lose (because that ult ain't doing shit while you're getting puke on your face and if Zed is ulting it means I know where he's going to land for muh skillshots)

{{item:3140}} vs. {{item:3157}}

WE DON'T NEED ULTIMATE!
For many moons people have been describing Urgot has an **anti-carry**.  I'm glad you finally realized what that meant.  I would recommend Ghost over Cleanse.
They should make an URFgot mode where it's like URF but everyone plays Urgot.
He counters kat as well.
i wouldn't really call it a counter but urgot actually competes on even footing with zed in a 1v1
A lot of things counter zed.
Did you guys miss the part where Bjerg's Zed roffelstomped Urgot over, and over?  Even with Ganks Bjerg couldn't be denied.
He did not. He just failed miserably and spammed R to pretend nothing happened. Then Urgot screwed up and died, but that was a bronze-like mistake from Urgot rather than Zed doing something.
Plus bjerg is the actual best Zed NA, maybe top 10-5 in the world...while no one is best urgot NA or anywhere
Why not Zed top?
Why the fuck cleanse? It doesn't remove death mark.

I think the point is more that Urgot *didn't* have exhaust or ignite.

Also, Urgot likes cleanse. He's got plenty or range, power, and damage mitigation. But lacks mobility and all his strengths are tied to his abilities.
the buff to his shield helps a lot, and he can ult Zed's ult to negate a lot of the potential damage.  i dont think he's necessarily a counterpick like malzahar or lissandra tho...
Urgot "counters" everyone.  It's called being broken OP.  It's like season 2 all over again.  Urgot is once again unstoppable.
People have been saying the exact same thing about Zed since season 4...

> [{quoted}](name=Kholdstare13,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Aj7yAAvM,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2015-03-27T20:03:14.563+0000)
>
> Urgot "counters" everyone.  It's called being broken OP.  It's like season 2 all over again.  Urgot is once again unstoppable.

OP?
Can you slightly shuffle left or right to dodge his canister? Congratulations, you countered Urgot.

i go on to spectate, i see a zed, against an urgot, the urgot has flash and cleanse
and he proceeds to lose so fucking hard to the zed.

meanwhile, Dark horses, urgot top.


Must be official. Zed beats urgot.
